host David Letterman underwent emergency heart surgery in 2000 and chatted candidly with Barbara Walters about his feelings of joy following the operation. But they didn't last long. is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. "Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time," he said.
